text: "Burn for You" is a 1990 song by Australian singer John Farnham and is the third single from his 14th studio album Chain Reaction. It went to number 5 in Australia. ==Track listings== Australian CD and 7-inch single # "Burn for You" \- 3:45 # "Chains Around the Heart" \- 6:36 12-inch single # "Burn for You" \- 3:45 # "The Time Has Come" \- 4:55 # "Chains Around the Heart" \- 6:36 == References == Category:1990 songs Category:John Farnham songs
title: Burn for You (John Farnham song)
